functions.name: getVideo
functions.description: Converts text infomation into a video script based on user query. A video script is a list of video chunks, each video chunk contains a scene and subtitle.

list_of_video_chunk.description: List of video_chunk to be included in the video, one video chunk should last 3-5 seconds and includes: 1. Scene  2. Subtitle

scene.description: Scene description for video should be visual and general

subtitles.description: Funny and sarcastic video subtitles script for video
